ValidationRule.description: Comments Reason for Cases > 10 Hrs field must be filled if the Reason for Cases>10 hrs is provided.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(Status), ( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Re-Closed') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Discard') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Portal Quoted') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Tech Issue-SR Assigned')),$RecordType.Name == 'Technical Issue',NOT($RecordType.Name = 'Service Recovery Report'||$RecordType.Name ='Technical Issue - Foreign Military'),NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Reason_for_Cases_Closed_10_Hrs__c))), ISPICKVAL(Classification__c,'GTO Tech Operations Center'), (ISPICKVAL(Sub_Class__c,'D&S')|| ISPICKVAL(Sub_Class__c,'Electrical(GTO)')|| ISPICKVAL(Sub_Class__c,'Mechanical(GTO)')), ISBLANK(Comments_Reason_for_Cases_10_Hrs__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Comments Reason for Cases >10 hours cannot be blank.Please enter a value.
